what_needs_improvement.root_cause: FBP fuel types limited to Canadian ecosystems

lessons_learned.lesson: Canadian FBP system is ecosystem-specific - not universal
lessons_learned.implication: Need custom fuel models for non-Canadian ecosystems

lessons_learned.lesson: California chaparral burns differently than Canadian C7 forests
